mapper.sql: id, user_uid, svip_level, svip_timeout, svip_identity, create_by, create_time, last_update_by, last_update_time
select rsd.id, rsd.user_uid, rsd.svip_level, rsd.svip_timeout, rsd.svip_identity, rsd.create_by, rsd.create_time, rsd.last_update_by, rsd.last_update_time from roncoo_svip_discount as rsd
